oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Poets and Prophets program - Gary Burr - 2017-10-07
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A program on the career and life to date of songwriter Gary Burr from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 7, 2017. Includes selected audio excerpts, audio from video and performances. Moderated by Michael Gray.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gary Burr;
